title: PVP.net Client has stopped working
body:
Hi everyone, since the patch that I personally had this morning (not sure if it was released last night after I logged off) the league client crashes/hangs/freezes a lot and pops up with a Windows error message saying that it needs to close. It does happen most often when I enter the shop (and of course I have ceased to enter the shop) but also has happened a couple of times in champ select, which is excessively irritating and is more than likely going to lead to penalties that I don't think I deserve. Does anyone have any official Rito word on this error? Because myself and most of my regular league buds are experiencing the error too.

TL;DR: rito pls fix client

replies.body: Its everyone.. An Official response would be great.
Yes, it does look fairly widespread. {{item:3070}}
